name: snorkel

a tube that lets you breathe while swimming under water by keeping one end in the mouth while the other ends sticks up above the surface of the water snorkeling noun [ U ] us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/ˈsnɔr·kə·lɪŋ/
We went snorkeling off the coast of Key West.
